articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman's Answer Distributed as Document of UN General Assembly and UNSC
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman's Answer Distributed as Document of UN General Assembly and UNSC
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The answer, given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry to question put by KCNA over the UN Security Council's press release faulting the DPRK's surface-to-surface medium to long-range strategic ballistic missile test-fire, was distributed as an official document A/71/796-S/2017/139 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on February 24.

articles.title: DPRK Medal Awarded to Austrian Personage
articles.content:
DPRK Medal Awarded to Austrian Personage
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Erich Zavadil, chairman of the Consultative Committee of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, was awarded the DPRK friendship medal.
					 An awarding ceremony took place in Vienna on February 14.
					
					 Present there were members of the Society and personages of various circles of Austria and the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Vienna.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Games Close
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Games Close
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Prize Sports Games closed with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here on Monday. The games started on February 1.
					 In the games the April 25 Sports Team placed first in men's and women's basketball and volleyball events.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned and sportspersons.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a new stamp (a sheetlet) reflecting the song "Ode to the Motherland".
					 Seen in the sheetlet are its words, an individual stamp carrying its score and others with pictures of magnolia, goshawk, Pungsan dog and pine tree (national flower, bird, dog and tree of the DPRK) against the flag of the DPRK and blue sky.
					
					 "Ode to the Motherland", created in September Juche 102 (2013), is popular among the DPRK people as the second national anthem of the country, as it inspires the ardent love for the motherland in the lofty style.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Love for People Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Love for People Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- World people are deeply impressed by the warm love shown by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for the Korean people.
					 A British expert on Korean affairs said in his recent article that Kim Jong Un's revolutionary activities this year show his tender-hearted and popular personality and fixed will to promote the country's economic development.
					
					 His article was posted on U.S. internet news on Feb. 14, evoking a lively world response.
					
					 This is a manifestation of the world community's deep respect for the peerlessly great man who has devoted himself to the country's prosperity and its people's happiness with the ardent spirit of devoted service to the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the tender-hearted father of the people as he has been working hard day and night with a single purpose to build as early as possible the strongest socialist power which has tremendous military muscle and ensures great prosperity and enables its people to enjoy a happy life with no more to desire in the world.
					
					 There are many countries in the world and each country has leaders but such father of the people is rare to be seen as Kim Jong Un who has dedicated his all to the people, believing in them as in Heaven.
					
					 That's why the army and people of the DPRK and the world progressives revere him with whole hearts.
					
					 There should be a noble scene of sharing thought, intention and affection between the leader who warmly loves the people and those who follow him with profound reverence.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have worked signal miracles in their struggle to bolster its defense capability and improve the standard of  people's living, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's strategic line of building a socialist power, and thus powerfully displayed the whole world the truth that Kim Jong Un's determination means practice.
					
					 His resolution and will are the faith, will and practice of all the servicepersons and civilians united close around him.
					
					 The Korean army and people will surely build a socialist power with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development, instilled into them by Kim Jong Un, as a dynamic force.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Provocateurs of Merciless Punishment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Provocateurs of Merciless Punishment
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Days ago the south Korean authorities urgently deployed a marine rapid task unit whose mission is to "strike the headquarters of the north and destroy its core facilities" on Yonphyong and Paekryong islands and three other islands in the West Sea of Korea. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It merits a serious attention that the south Korean warmongers deployed the above-said unit at the doorstep of the north, escalating the tension there.
					
					 These days the U.S. is ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and increasing its military threat to it, absurdly claiming that its legitimate test-fire of the new strategic weapon system conducted as part of the steps for bolstering capability for self-defence was "provocation" and "threat."
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, the south Korean military in collusion with the U.S. is busy with such saber-rattling as missile warning drill and joint naval maneuvers targeted against the north almost every day, pushing the situation to an extreme pitch of tension.
					
					 The forward-deployment of the said unit in the hotspot waters of the West Sea, where the two sides are standing in acute confrontation, amounts to a deliberate provocation to drive the growing tension on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 The Korean People's Army will never pardon those keen to ignite a war against the north as bullet shields of the U.S.
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind that they are bound to perish while going reckless depending on the U.S. nuclear umbrella.
					
					 They should not forget the bitter lesson drawn from the skirmish on Yonphyong Island.
					
					 If the south Korean warmongers recklessly ignite a war against the DPRK, challenging its patriotic call and sincere efforts, its army will mercilessly wipe out the provocateurs and blow up their bases, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives' Meetings against Candlelight Rallies Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives' Meetings against Candlelight Rallies Condemned
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) issued a statement on Sunday blasting the Park Geun Hye group's reckless meetings to counter the candlelight action of the public, according to the internet website Kuguk Jonson.
					 Candlelight of justice held high by the people is raging more furiously across south Korea with the trial for traitor Park Geun Hye's impeachment approaching, the statement said, and continued: 
					
					 A handful of ultraconservative forces are holding meetings to counter the candlelight action of the public near its venue in a bid to stem the trend of candlelight actions.
					
					 Their meetings are nothing but the last-ditch efforts to let traitor Park Geun Hye go unpunished though she had been sentenced to death by the public and help the corrupt and incompetent regime get rid of the abyss of ruin.
					
					 Those who took part in such meetings are dotards of the "Association of Love for Park Geun Hye", "General Federation for Freedom", "Oboi Association" and other ultraconservative organizations and Park's followers of "Liberal Korea Party".
					
					 Those who vociferated at the meetings were none other than the hooligans who were either condemned by the public for insulting candlelight actions or sparked off great uproar for perpetrating sexual scandals and other scams.
					
					 The meetings of the ultraconservative organizations are government-sponsored events of philistines and riffraff bribed by it.
					
					 The conservative organizations are making no scruple of shamelessly conducting such false propaganda as exaggerating the number of the participants of the meetings hundreds of times as their actual attendance was too small to attract the attention of media.
					
					 As far as the nature of meetings was concerned, it was no more than a ruckus of reckless hooligans only to come under fire at home and abroad.
					
					 The reckless counter meetings of ultra-rightist conservatives will only further precipitate the doomsday of traitor Park.

articles.title: 17th All-People Action Waged across S. Korea
articles.content:
17th All-People Action Waged across S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The 17th all-people action was simultaneously staged across south Korea on February 25 to demand the resignation of traitor Park Geun Hye, according to reports.
					 More than 1,078,000 people including members of organizations of various circles, residents, chiefs of local self-governing bodies, lawmakers of opposition parties took part in the struggle with candlelight in their hands under the sponsorship of the emergency people's action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 A plenary rally took place at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul after over 800,000 Seoul citizens and masses of various circles from each region gathered.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants waged demonstration march shouting slogans like "Impeach Park Geun Hye".
					
					 Similar rallies were held across south Korea.
					
					 Many south Korean media such as Newsis and Media Today reported the actions as breaking news.

articles.title: S. Korean Farmers Start Tractor Demonstration Urging Impeachment of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Farmers Start Tractor Demonstration Urging Impeachment of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The "Jon Pong Jun Action Group" in south Korea, consisting of members of the Federation of Peasants Associations, started the 3rd tractor demonstration in areas of South Chungchong and North and South Jolla provinces on February 23 in demand of Park Geun Hye's impeachment and guarantee of rice price, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Saying that the demonstration would be expanded to at least 100 cities and counties across south Korea till March 3, the group declared that it would enter Seoul with tractors if a decision on impeachment of Park is turned down.

articles.title: S. Koreans Struggle to Get Agreement on THAAD Deployment Nullified
articles.content:
S. Koreans Struggle to Get Agreement on THAAD Deployment Nullified
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Organizations opposed to the projected deployment of THAAD in south Korea reportedly held a press conference on February 23 together with lawmakers at which they called for the nullification of the agreement on THAAD deployment.
					 Speakers at the conference said the agreement was no more than a report on the results of the south Korea-U.S. joint working group's operation.
					
					 Calling for totally nullifying the agreement, they urged the "National Assembly" to make a comprehensive investigation into it to shed light on its illegality, declare its nullification and punish the very one responsible for it.
					
					 The press conference was followed by another conference outside the Lotte Department Store, where they demanded the Lotte Group halt the offer of land for THAAD.
					
					 Meanwhile, inhabitants of Sosong-ri, Chojon-myon of Songju County in North Kyongsang Province reportedly blocked in token of protest the road leading to Songju Golf Links designated as the site for THAAD deployment on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Knizhnii Mir Publishing House of Russia on February 15 brought out in pamphlet "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious", a work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a history of victory in which the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il have been displayed.
					
					 And it stresses the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be invincible.

articles.title: Russian Personage Vows to Strive for Russia-DPRK Ties
articles.content:
Russian Personage Vows to Strive for Russia-DPRK Ties
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- We will make positive contribution to the development of the Russia-DPRK relations by continuing to publish works of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					 Robanov, director-general of the Knizhnii Mir Publishing House of Russia, said this at a ceremony held on February 15 to release "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious", a work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that the work is a highly important document comprehensively dealing with the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and its mission.
					
					 He noted with pleasure that his publishing house has given wide publicity to the greatness of Kim Jong Un among the Russian people through publication of his works.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Mexico
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Political parties, the parliament and organizations of Mexico held such events as celebration meeting, seminar, lecture meeting, reading session, book and photo exhibition and film show in the period from January 26 to February 15 to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of events were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of the great persons of Mt Paektu and other Korean books and photos introducing the struggle of the Korean army and people.
					
					 Such Korean films as "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" were shown.
					
					  Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party, referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il resolutely frustrated the anti-DPRK moves of the imperialists and firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country with his unique Songun politics.
					
					  After reading Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party", Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, praised the exploits of Kim Jong Il who glorified the Juche idea, the Songun idea as the guiding idea in the era of independence and turned the DPRK into an invincible military power which no formidable enemies dare provoke.
					
					  Andres Gasca Sanchez, president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, and others praised Kim Jong Il who demonstrated the might of socialist Korea to the whole world and Kim Jong Un who has creditably carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche without an inch of deflection.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the DPRK missions in different countries between February 7 and 16 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Those floral baskets were laid before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and art works depicting them at the missions.
					
					 They came from the Committee for External Affairs of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Lao Ministry of Defence, the Laos-Korea Friendship Association, the Lao defence minister who is member of the Political Bureau of the LPRP Central Committee and members of the C.C., LPRP, the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company and the Federation of Trade Unions in Maritime Territory of Russia, the president of the Socialist Party of Benin, the chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and the general manager of Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., of Hong Kong, the secretary general of the China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission and other personages of units of China.
					
					 Also, the co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation sent a floral basket and the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group a large flower pot to DPRK missions on February 11 and 15.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua gestiones de importantes empresas de Hamhung
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua gestiones de importantes empresas de Hamhung
Hamhung, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las gestiones de importantes empresas de la ciudad de Hamhung. 
					Ante todo, se entero de los detalles de la produccion y la amplificacion de la capacidad productiva del Complejo de Fertilizantes de Hungnam, el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong. 
					
					En las reuniones consultivas convocadas en los mismos lugares se discutieron los temas para registrar un auge innovador en la produccion de abono Juche, vinalon y equipos encargados y acabar con antelacion las obras de objetos en construccion. 
					
					Y se tomaron las medidas para que las unidades relacionadas envien a tiempo las materias primas y los materiales necesarios aprendiendo el temperamento de lucha y la manera de trabajo de los creadores del espiritu de la provincia de Kangwon. 
					
					El premier estuvo tambien en la Fabrica de Electrodo de Hungnam y el Complejo Pesquero en Altura de Sinpho, donde busco las medidas para asegurar la produccion de electrodo con recursos nacionales, modernizar mas el Complejo y renovar los procesos de produccion de la Fabrica de Conservas de Pescado de Sinpho.

articles.title: AHC acusa expediente criminal de la familia de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
AHC acusa expediente criminal de la familia de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de Historiadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 26 un acta de acusacion sobre los crimenes sin precedentes cometidos por la familia de "Yusin" (renovacion) con el fin de grabar en la historia la leccion de que hay que sufrir grandes desgracias y verguenzas y pagar muy caro si aparecen dentro de la nacion y andan con petulancia los traidores tan sucios como el clan de Park Geun-hye.
					Es una verguenza que haya aparecido en la nacion coreana esa familia de traidores de peor calana que se mantienen sirviendo a grandes potencias y llevan una vida opulenta y suntuosa a cambio de sus actos vendepatrias, comienza el documento y continua:
					
					Park Song Bin, abuelo de Park Geun-hye, fue el traidor quien se gano un rango de jerarquia por el "merito" de ponerse al frente en reprimir a las tropas campesinas bajo el mando de Jon Pong Jun que se levantaron bajo la bandera de "rechazamiento a la invasion de los europeos y los japoneses" y "proteccion del pais y tranquilidad del pueblo".
					
					Su hijo es el traidor no.1 Park Chung-hee de quien descendieron Park Geun-hye y otros.
					
					Park Chung-hee fue el "ciudadano imperial" japones que cambio su nombre por el estilo japones, Masao Takaki, y juro la "fidelidad" al rey japones, caudillo de agresion y matanza que convirtio el territorio coreano en un bano de sangre, entregandole hasta el juramento escrito con sangre.
					
					El asumio la actitud mas servil en las relaciones con EE.UU.
					
					Esta conducta fue reproducida por sus descendientes como Park Geun-hye que ha sido la peor entre los sucesivos gobernantes en vender a las fuerzas extranjeras la dignidad e intereses nacionales.
					
					Entre otros crimenes, ella declaro la renuncia total al mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra entregado a EE.UU., se puso mas activista que nadie en introducir en el Sur de Corea el THAAD, anulo el caso de esclavitud sexual impuesta por el viejo ejercito japones y les abrio el camino de reagresion a los reaccionarios japoneses, enemigos jurados, mediante la firma del convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares.
					
					Se dedicaron a porfia a los actos vendepatrias todos los miembros de la familia de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Diciendo que "debemos ser projaponeses y proyanquis" y "no se debe criticar la visita al santuario Yasukuni", la hermana de ella, Park Geun Ryong, enaltecio al rey japones como "Su Majestad Emperador" y chismeo que "es una verguenza demandar la disculpa de Japon por un hecho pasado de la historia".
					
					Cuando ocurrio el incidente de punalada contra el embajador norteamericano en el Sur de Corea, su marido Sin Tong Uk acudio con toda prisa al hospital y realizo ahi el "ayuno para pedir perdon", hecho que fue condenado y burlado por todo el mundo.
					
					Park Chung-hee y su hija cometio horrendos crimenes ante la causa de reunificacion.
					
					El padre ofendio comparando como "una hoja" la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, documento acordado por el Norte y el Sur por primera vez de la historia de division de la nacion coreana, y marcho por la senda de confrontacion fratricida y division nacional.
					
					La prueba material es el muro de hormigon que atraviesa el medio del territorio nacional, el cual fue construido en el regimen de Park Chung-hee.
					
					Tan pronto como se hiciera inquilina de Chongwadae, su hija insulto la sagrada aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion con la palabra vulgar de "Taebak" (gran tesoro), termino de los negociantes y jugadores de casino, al cabo de insistir en su "politica sobre el Norte" como "proceso de confianza" y la "Declaracion de Dresden" que exponen la ambicion de confrontacion fratricida y unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes del Norte y el Sur.
					
					En las orgias preparadas en Chongwadae, instigo a la chusma al lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC e instalo en Seul hasta la "Oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU, aparato intrigante anti-RPDC, lo que no pudieron hacer ni sus antecesores.
					
					Al cerrar hasta la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, criatura de la epoca del 15 de Junio y ultimo sosten de las relaciones intercoreanas, cometio la locura comparable con la de su padre quien dividio en dos partes el territorio nacional con el muro de hormigon.
					
					Casi todos los dias, libro los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-Norte en contubernio con EE.UU. y Japon.
					
					Como si fuera poco su campana de DDHH anti-RPDC, se dedico personalmente a la "agitacion a la fuga del Norte".
					
					La familia de dictadores es recordista tambien en los actos de tirania.
					
					Durante 18 anos de mandato, el traidor Park Chung-hee convirtio todo el suelo surcoreano en la prision militar sin rejas, la tierra privada de libertad y derechos humanos y el infierno inventando infames leyes fascistas y aparatos de represion.
					
					Durante la dictadura de "Yusin", fueron fabricadas o enmendadas mas de 2 mil leyes.
					
					Lo que hizo su hija a lo largo de su mandato fue elogiar la dictadura de su padre y resucitarla en todos los sentidos.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de "defender el regimen" y "purgar las fuerzas pro-Norte", ella convirtio el suelo surcoreano en el lugar donde se acaban con la democracia y derechos humanos.
					
					Entre los gobernantes surcoreanos, Park Chung-hee y Park Geun-hye fueron los campeones en cancelar los medios de prensa legitimos, por ejemplo, los periodicos Minjok Ilbo y Jaju Minbo.
					
					Pero, la historia y la nacion no perdonan nunca a ese clan de malvados.
					
					Siendo paralizada en su funcion de "presidenta", Park Geun-hye espera ahora la severa sentencia de la historia en una habitacion apartada de Chongwadae, cercada por la ola de manifestantes con velas encendidas.
					
					El fin tragico es destino fatal de los Park.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos califican a Hong Yong Phyo de maniaco conflictivo N-S
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos califican a Hong Yong Phyo de maniaco conflictivo N-S
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hong Yong Phyo, ministro de Unificacion surcoreano, concedio hace poco una "charla de invitacion". 
					En la ocasion, Hong alabo el cierre de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong como el "exito mas grande" en las "politicas sobre el Norte" y dijo que el discurso de "Thong-il Taebak (cajon de tesoros para la unificacion)", pronunciado por la traidora Park Geun-hye, "ha despertado el interes y el animo de los habitantes", lo que hirio la opinion publica. 
					
					De hecho, Hong es maniaco conflictivo que siendo papagayo de Park, destruyo totalmente las relaciones intercoreanas sin tomar en consideracion los asuntos de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 26, y continua:
					
					Hoy tambien en el Sur de Corea se escuchan las voces de critica de que el cierre de la ZIK deviene el error mas grande de las "politicas sobre el Norte" de la traidora Park. 
					
					La horda traidora no podra encubrir con nada sus crimenes de haber cortado la ultima linea vital de las relaciones intercoreanas entregandose a la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					A pesar de la realidad, el maniaco conflictivo disparateo locamente que la suspension total de la ZIK habria sido un "dolor penetrante" y "precio riguroso" para alguien.
					
					A su vez, Minju Joson tambien enfatiza en su comentario individual del mismo dia que el traidor Hong probara la consecuencia tragica y horrible de su picoteria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun advierte a provocadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun advierte a provocadores surcoreanos 
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, los titeres surcoreanos emplazaron con urgencia en las cinco islas del Mar Oeste de Corea incluso las islas Yonphyong y Paekryong una unidad naval de movilidad expedita con la mision de "atacar la Direccion" y "destruir sus instalaciones nucleares" de alguien. 
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este lunes un comentario individual que senala como sigue:
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. intensifica mas que nunca la sancion, presion y amenaza militar contra la RPDC cuestionando injustamente como "provocacion" y "amenaza" su lanzamiento de prueba de nuevo sistema de arma estrategica, recien realizado como una de las medidas de autodefensa.
					
					Mientras tanto, el circulo militar surcoreano libra diariamente los alborotos belicos anti-RPDC en confabulacion con EE.UU. tales como los ejercicios de alarma de misil y el simulacro conjunto de movilidad en el mar, agravando al extremo la situacion. 
					
					En tal circunstancia, los titeres surcoreanos ubicaron la unidad naval en la zona candente del Mar Oeste donde se enfrentan agudamente las fuerzas armadas de ambas partes coreanas. Esto es una provocacion premeditada para llevar a la fase de explosion la tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La RPDC no perdonara jamas a los provocadores que actuan como carne de canon de EE.UU. 
					
					Ellos deben tener presente que el garrote nuclear de su amo norteamericano no puede salvar el destino de si mismos. 
					
					Y no deben olvidar las lecciones de la isla de Yonphyong. 
					
					Si cometen una imprudente provocacion desafiando al llamamiento patriotico y los esfuerzos sinceros de la parte connacional, el Ejercito Popular de Corea aniquilaran despiadadamente a los provocadores y eliminaran por completo sus nidos.
